src:
Frka u Baru: Boutrajt provocirao publiku, pa bežao od batina
Nesportski potez američkog košarkaša kada je sve već bilo rešeno

02 Nov 2019

Pala je Cedevita Olimpija i na Jadranu, po prvi put! Nije tako delovalo nakon prvog poluvremena, ali Mornar je uspeo da napravi veliki povratak u nastavku utakmice i da upiše veoma vrednu pobedu pred domaćim navijačima kojima se probio ka samom vrhu tabele - 77:70.
Međutim, meč je obeležio skandal u poslednjim sekundama utakmice, kada su košarkaši Mornara odlučili da samo potroše preostalo vreme do kraja utakmice. Boutrajt se nesportski poneo, ukrao je loptu Pulenu, a potom i zakucao. To se domaćoj publici nimalo nije dopalo, jedan od navijača uleteo je na teren, pojurio je Amerikanca i čak uspeo da ga dokači plastičnim predmetom, čini se vuvuzelom.
Amerikanac je uzvratio, želeći da se obračuna sa navijačem i nastala je velika gužva. Većali su arbitri šta da urade nakon toga čitavih 10 minuta šta da urade, a epilog je bio takav da je Jaka Blažič isključen, a Rajan Boutrajt je dobio tehničku grešku. Srećom, sve se na tome i završilo...
A što se same utakmice tiče, na samom startu činilo se da je Mornar u potpunom ponoru. Cedevita Olimpija je odmah na startu napravila seriju od 16:2, povela sa 14 poena prednosti i bila je miljama ispred domaćih kada je reč o igri i organizaciji. Ipak, Barani su se trgli, povezali su nekoliko dobrih napada i nakon uvodnih deset minuta gubili su sa „samo“ sedam poena razlike - 15:22.
Iako se činilo da će Mornar uspeti da se približi u drugoj deonici, pošto Cedevita Olimpija nije blistala, to se nije desilo. Naprotiv, nakon što domaći nisu iskoristili svoje prilike, Zmajevi su uzvarili i otišli na 13 poena prednosti, koliko su imali pred drugo poluvreme - 29:42.
No, potpuni krah je doživela Cedevita Olimpija po povratku sa odmora. Ništa nije polazilo od ruke u napadu gostima, ređali su promašaj za promašajem, a Mornar je konačno pronašao svoje najjače oružje - šut za tri poena. Upravo sa dva takva pogotka završen je treći kvartal i to nerešenim rezultatom - 56:56. Bjelica i Markota su tada postigli vredne koševe za domaćina.
Nije mogla da se sastavi Cedevita Olimpija ni na početku poslednje deonice. Previše grešaka pravili su gosti, dozvoljavali su Mornaru da lako dolazi do koša. Doduše, i dalje su trojke održavale domaće „iznad vode“.
Kako je deonica odmicala, tako je Mornar sve više uspevao da se rezultatski "odmakne" od gostiju. Doduše, teško da bi to uspeli da raspoložen nije bio Džejkob Pulen, koji je u samoj završnici napravio par zaista izvrsnih prodora. Uz to, atmosferu je u Topolici podizao i Derek Nidam. Kada se sve sabere, Cedevita Olimpija je u potpunosti bila potopljena.
Najefikasniji kod domaćih na kraju je bio upravo Džejkob Pulen, koji je na svom kontu imao 17 poena, dok kod gostiju nije bilo preterano raspoloženog pojedinca. Najbolji je bio Miler-Mekintajer sa 14 poena.

ABA LIGA - 5. KOLO

PetakKrka - Primorska  71:89/Jošilo 20 - Heris 23/
SubotaMornar - Cedevita Olimpija 77:70/Pulen 17 - Miler-Mekintajer 14/20.00: (1,20) Partizan (19,0) FMP (5,00)

Nedelja12.00: (4,40) Mega (17,0) Budućnost (1,25)18.00: (5,50) Cibona (20,0) Crvena zvezda (1,17)20.00: (1,30) Igokea (16,0) Zadar (3,90)


*** kvote su podložne promenama

text:
The Brawl in Bar: Boutright provoked the crowd and ran away from the beat
An unsportsmanlike move by an American basketball player when everything was already settled

02 Nov 2019

Cedevita Olympia falls in the Adriatic for the first time! It didn't work like that after the first half, but Sailor was able to make a big comeback in the continuation of the game and to record a very valuable victory in front of the home fans who made it to the top of the table - 77:70.
However, the match was marked by scandal in the final seconds of the game, when the Navy basketball players decided to only spend the remaining time until the end of the game. Boutwright went unsportsmanlike, stole the ball to Pulen and then scored. The home crowd didn't like it at all, one of the fans stormed the field, rushed the American and even managed to get him a plastic object, it seems like a vuvuzel.
The American retaliated, wanting to deal with the fan and a huge crowd ensued. After that, the arbitrators were hungry for 10 minutes afterwards, and the epilogue was such that Jaka Blazic was ruled out and Ryan Boutright got a technical foul. Fortunately, that all ended ...
And as for the match itself, at the very beginning it seemed that the Sailor was in a complete abyss. Cedevita Olympia made a 16-2 run immediately, led by 14 points and were miles ahead of the home team in terms of play and organization. Still, the Barans were shaking, tying in a couple of good tackles and after the opening ten minutes they lost by "just" seven points difference - 15:22.
Although it seemed that the Sailor would be able to get closer in the second section, since Cedevita Olympia did not shine, it did not happen. On the contrary, after the hosts did not use their opportunities, the Dragons boiled and went to 13 points advantage, which they had before the second half - 29:42.
But Cedevita Olympia suffered a complete collapse on her return from vacation. Nothing went hand-in-hand in attacking the guests, they ran a miss after a miss, and the Sailor finally found his strongest weapon - a three-point shot. It was with just two such hits that the third quarter ended with a draw - 56:56. Bjelica and Markota then scored valuable points for the hosts.
Cedevita Olympia could not be drafted even at the beginning of the last section. Too many mistakes were made by the guests, they allowed the Sailor to easily reach the basket. Admittedly, the three still maintained a domestic “above water”.
As the section progressed, so did the Navy increasingly manage to "move away" from the guests. Admittedly, they could hardly have made it in the mood of Jacob Pulen, who made a couple of really great breakthroughs in the final. In addition, the atmosphere in Topolica was raised by Derek Nidam. When it all came together, Cedevita Olympia was completely submerged.
In the end, the most efficient in the home was Jacob Poulen, who had 17 points on his account, while the guests did not have an overly moody individual. The best was Miller-McIntyre with 14 points.

ABA LEAGUE - DAY 5

FridayKrka - Primorska 71: 89 / Josilo 20 - Heris 23 /
Saturday Sailor - Cedevita Olympia 77: 70 / Poulain 17 - Miller-McIntyre 14 / 20.00: (1,20) Partizan (19,0) FMP (5,00)

Sunday12.00: (4.40) Mega (17.0) Future (1.25) 18.00: (5.50) Cibona (20.0) Red Star (1.17) 20.00: (1.30) Igokea ( 16.0) Zadar (3.90)
